header.subtitle: Strategic partnership
header.title: iTalent Career Assessment
header.des-1: Explore your entire personality, abilities, and interests in 45 minutes.
header.des-2: Especially designed for students in grades 6-12 with science certifications from strategic partners IBM Kenexa and Everything DISC.

introduce.title: What is iTalent Career Assessment?
introduce.text-1: iTalent Student Career Assessment is a test that helps students find their dream job based on three factors: ability, personality, and career interests.
introduce.text-2: Customized for youngsters from grades 6 to 12, the questionnaire provides a detailed picture of themselves. Therefore, it helps them to raise career orientation and self-developed in the future.
introduce.text-3: iTalent career assessment on the JobTest platform is proud to have taken by more than 200,000 students from over 50 prominent high schools and universities: Vinschool, UNIST Korea, SMU Singapore, FPT University, University of Economics and Law,...

benefit.title: The applicability of the iTalent Career Assessment
benefit.text-5: Enhance your learning abilities and productivity

question.title: Sample Question and Report
question.text-1: Each assessment section has a system of 120 assessment questions, situations, and practical activities.
question.text-2: The JobTest report shows an overview and detailed analysis of your abilities, personality and interests.

about.text-1: JobTest is an international standard human resource development consulting company based on a combination of leading HR and Technology experts. Application of artificial intelligence (AI), connected things (IOT - Internet of things), digital human resources (Digital workforce) and digital platforms (Platform, Blockchain, Big data).
about.text-2: Currently, JobTest is the leading online career guidance and competency assessment platform in Vietnam, as well as a provider of international standard human resource solutions, creating high-quality human resources for businesses.
about.text-3: In December 2021, JobTest Human Resource Development Consulting Company officially became the first strategic partner of Everything DiSC in Vietnam.
about.text-4: Everything DiSC - a brand of John Wiley and Sons Group - which has the largest book library platform in the world. Wiley and Sons contributes to improving work performance, providing experience and efficiency for human resource development, teamwork, talent discovery, leadership development for individuals and businesses worldwide bridge.
about.text-5: JobTest became IBM Kenexa's first strategic partner in Vietnam in August 2017, inheriting innovative recruitment technologies.
about.text-6: IBM is one of the world's most well-known information technology companies, specializing in hardware - software products and services. IBM purchased Kenexa in 2012 to boost its position in the human resource management application industry. The software for recruiting and developing the top individuals for the world's leading corporate network is known as IBM Kenexa.
